title: Historical Trend Type Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of categories of significant historical developments over time in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each historical trend type (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

technological_evolution.description: Progressive changes in tools, techniques, or systems that expand human capabilities.

social_transformation.description: Fundamental shifts in relationships, structures, or interactions within communities and populations.

political_restructuring.description: Reconfiguration of power distributions, governance systems, or decision-making processes.

economic_shift.description: Changes in patterns of production, distribution, exchange, or resource allocation.

cultural_movement.description: Development and spread of new artistic styles, values, traditions, or expressions.

ideological_spread.description: Expansion or contraction of specific belief systems, philosophies, or world-views.

military_development.description: Evolution in warfare capabilities, organization, doctrine, or technology.

environmental_change.description: Alterations in natural conditions, ecosystems, climate, or relationship between humans and environment.

demographic_transition.description: Shifts in population size, composition, distribution, or movement patterns.

scientific_revolution.description: Fundamental changes in knowledge paradigms, research methods, or understanding of natural phenomena.

artistic_renaissance.description: Flowering of creativity, innovation, or expression in literature, visual arts, music, or performance.

religious_reformation.description: Transformation of spiritual practices, theological interpretations, or religious institutions.

organizational_emergence.description: Rise of new institutional forms, collective structures, or ways of coordinating human activity.

global_integration.description: Increasing interconnection between previously separate regions, cultures, markets, or systems.

power_consolidation.description: Concentration of authority, influence, or control in fewer entities or centralized structures.

resource_depletion.description: Progressive reduction in availability of important materials, energy sources, or environmental capacities.

knowledge_advancement.description: Expansion of information, understanding, education, or expertise in specific domains.

conflict_escalation.description: Increasing tension, competition, or hostility between groups, nations, or factions.

infrastructure_expansion.description: Development of physical systems and networks that support societal functioning.

communication_evolution.description: Changes in methods, technologies, or patterns of information exchange and symbolic interaction.

magical_awakening.description: Emergence, increase, or transformation in supernatural forces, arcane practices, or mystical abilities.

consciousness_shift.description: Fundamental transformation in awareness, perception, or ways of understanding reality or identity.

rights_expansion.description: Extension of legal protections, freedoms, or recognized entitlements to additional groups or domains.

territorial_reorganization.description: Changing patterns of spatial control, boundary definitions, or jurisdictional arrangements.

space_exploration.description: Advancement into and utilization of extra-planetary environments by societies or organizations.

categoryMapping.description: Grouping of trend types by domain (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

material_conditions.description: Trends related to the physical world and tools humans create.

social_systems.description: Trends related to how people organize collectively and distribute power.

ideational_elements.description: Trends related to ideas, beliefs, knowledge, and expressions.

power_relationships.description: Trends related to control, competition, and cooperation between entities.
